q0.query: Give me the job position's information of the employee with last name 'Milgrom'.
q0.query_example: Give me the job position's information of the employee with ssn 222-52-5555.

q1.query: Compute the average salary of the employees with a female gender.
q1.query_example: Compute the average salary of the employees with a good performance.

q2.query: Give me the social security number of all the employees that works in Atlanta.
q2.query_example: Give me the first and last name of all employees that works at address '312 Mount View Dr'.

q3.query: Give me the difference between the mean salaries of the 'Manager' and 'Regional Manager' position titles.
q3.evidence: We want information about the job positions not about the individual employees
q3.query_example: Give me the mean of salary of the 'Account Representative' position title

q4.query: Give me the location adress of the workplace of all 'Regional Managers'.
q4.query_example: Give me the location name of the workplace of all 'Managers'.

q5.query: Count all employees' with locationID less than 4
q5.query_example: Count all employees' with positionID greater or equal than 3
